name: Shag Room
description: Oh no! The carpet is too tall and it's orange.  You have entered a throw back shag carpet room.  The carpet is twice as tall as you are and you feel trapped! All is not lost however, you just have to solve a problem and you can escape this 70s nightmare.

exits.description: You look up and see the ceiling.
You look down and see carpet.

problemDescription: Out pops a spider and askes you to solve the following problem or it will ensnare you and eat you.
